description: Configuration to generate optimizied molecules using Graph-Based Genetic algorithm

target.title: Scoring functions with parameters
target.description: Scoring functions will be used to generate a score for SMILES.

batch_size.title: Batch Size
batch_size.description: Batch size used for the generative model sampling.

population_size.title: Population Size
population_size.description: it is used with n_mutations for the initial generation of smiles within the population

mutation_rate.title: Mutation Rate
mutation_rate.description: frequency of the new mutations in a single gene or organism over time

offspring_size.title: Offspring Size
offspring_size.description: number of molecules to select for new population

random_start.title: Random Start
random_start.description: set to True to randomly choose list of SMILES for generating optimizied molecules

patience.title: Patience
patience.description: it is used for early stopping if population scores remains the same after generating molecules
